body:
You can use this service to apply for a court order about your child arrangements in England and Wales.

The process is different if you’re applying in [Scotland]({app:urls:url:court-process-scotland}) and [Northern Ireland]({app:urls:url:court-process-northern-ireland}).

(i) If you can make your arrangements out of court you’ll help families in urgent situations that involve domestic abuse get to court quicker.
heading: Apply to court about your child arrangements
